about_the_game:
This colorful set of Pixel Art portraits offers a wealth of variety for your game. Inspired by the likes of Stardew Valley and Final Fantasy IV, this pack brings to life a multitude of personalities, formatted in many different ways, to fully unlock their potential as well as to allow you ease of use within your specific game project.

This pack contains the following:

* PICTURES: 64x64 base portraits that are a bit larger than a faceset.
* FACESETS: 48x48 base faces that can be easily used within a plethora of RPG MAKER engines. They are cropped from the Pictures.
* GAL: With full layer editability so you can remix, recolor and further customize the artworks. It is the file format of the freeware program GraphicsGale, my Pixel Art editor of choice.
* UPSCALES: In case you prefer the deliberate upscaled look, there are x2, x3 and x4 xBR upscaled versions of each sprite.
* PAPIER: Further modifications of the UPSCALES, PAPIER gives the upscaled portraits a paper-like feel, inspired by famous Tactical RPGs.
* BONUS: SYSTEM graphics, icons and UI backgrounds.

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in Visual Novel Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games

Inspired by the likes of Stardew Valley and Final Fantasy IV, this pack brings to life a multitude of personalities, formatted in many different ways, to fully unlock their potential as well as to allow you ease of use within your specific game project.

* UPSCALES: In case you prefer the deliberate upscaled look, there are x2, x3 and x4 xBR upscaled versions of each sprite.
